means: （印度男人的）腹带，徽带，装饰带

PerfectNetExp.abs: 进出口专业英语词汇(C8) ... cumin 小茴香 cummerbund 腹带 cumquat 金桔.
如果有装饰的需求，亦可佩带腰封（Cummerbund）、丝质口袋金、胸花、帽子或怀表。经历了从燕尾服的替代品，到大多数人的宴 …
cuff 袖口；裤脚cummerbund 腰带；宽带子；装饰带curve 弯曲；成曲线

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Urdu and Persian kamar-band, from kamar 'waist, loins' and -bandi 'band'. The sash was formerly worn in the Indian subcontinent by domestic workers and low-status office workers

entry.def: A cummerbund is a wide piece of cloth worn round the waist as part of a man's evening dress.

means.word_mean: 1. a broad pleated sash worn as formal dress with a tuxedo

auth_sentence.content: I kept expecting somebody in a cummerbund to show up with dinner!

auth_sentence.content: Just in case, he is telling Washington clients don't put on a red bow tie or cummerbund.
